SydneyÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â´s world is turned upside down when she learns she may work for the very enemy she thought she was fighting. Now sheÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â´s entangled in a covert lifestyle where she is forced to question the allegiances of everyone, including those closest to her. Entertainment Weekly says ALIAS is "a spy-fi roller coaster of killer gadgets, double roundkicks, triple crosses, poignant confessionals, cliff-hangers, sliced-off fingers, conspiracies, outrageous outfits, exotic locales, flirtations, mythologies -- and thatÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â´s just before the first commercial break." Now see the 22 mesmerizing episodes that launched it all in this 6-disc set. YouÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â´ll also experience never-before-seen extras that give you special access inside the world of ALIAS. This edge-of-your-seat collection with its heart-pounding action of unpredictable plot twists will have you gasping for air and begging for Season 2! 

Other features 
Interactive Menus, Scene Access, Audio commentaries, TV Spots, "Creating Characters" lecture at the Museum of Television and Radio, "The Animated Alias: Tribunal": The Missing Two Years Revealed, "Inside Stunts", "Burbank in Barcelona": a featurette on production des, "Alias Close-Up": Behind-the-scenes, "Monday Night Football": teaser
